mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_TBL_10 (PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_INFO, PRODUCT_DATE, COMPANY, MANAGER_ID) VALUES( #{product_id}, #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_info}, #{product_date}, #{company}, #{manager_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT_TBL_10 ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID
